energy-master.name: Energy Master
energy-master.description: Every AP gain is increased by 1.

augmented-first-strike.name: Augmented First Strike
augmented-first-strike.description: 50% increased damage on the first hit. Once per battle.

survivor.name: Survivor
survivor.description: Survive fatal damage with 1 Health. Once per battle.

lucky-aim.name: Lucky Aim
lucky-aim.description: 30% chance to recover 1 AP on hitting a Weak Point.

second-chance.name: Second Chance
second-chance.description: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.

solo-fighter.name: Solo Fighter
solo-fighter.description: Deal 50% more damage if fighting alone.

teamwork.name: Teamwork
teamwork.description: 10% increased damage while all allies are alive.

sweet-kill.name: Sweet Kill
sweet-kill.description: Recover 50% Health on killing an enemy.

auto-powerful.name: Auto Powerful
auto-powerful.description: Apply Powerful for 3 turns on battle start.

auto-shell.name: Auto Shell
auto-shell.description: Apply Shell for 3 turns on battle start.

auto-rush.name: Auto Rush
auto-rush.description: Apply Rush for 3 turns on battle start.

auto-regen.name: Auto Regen
auto-regen.description: Apply Regen for 3 turns on battle start.

dodger.name: Dodger
dodger.description: Gain 1 AP on Perfect Dodge. Once per turn.

perilous-parry.name: Perilous Parry
perilous-parry.description: +1 AP on Parry, but damage received is doubled.

confident.name: Confident
confident.description: Take 50% less damage, but can't be Healed.

energising-revive.name: Energising Revive
energising-revive.description: +3 AP to all allies when revived.

rejuvenating-revive.name: Rejuvenating Revive
rejuvenating-revive.description: Apply Regen for 3 turns when revived.

revive-with-shell.name: Revive With Shell
revive-with-shell.description: Apply Shell for 3 turns on revive.

solidifying.name: Solidifying
solidifying.description: +2 Shields when the character's Health falls below 50%. Once per battle.

powerful-revive.name: Powerful Revive
powerful-revive.description: Apply Powerful for 3 turns when revived.

revive-with-rush.name: Revive With Rush
revive-with-rush.description: Apply Rush for 3 turns on revive.

piercing-shot.name: Piercing Shot
piercing-shot.description: 25% increased Free Aim damage. Free Aim shots ignore Shields.

burning-dodge.name: Burning Dodge
burning-dodge.description: Successful Dodges can Burn the attacker.

defense-breaker-dodge.name: Defense Breaker Dodge
defense-breaker-dodge.description: Successful Dodges can apply Defenseless to the attacker.

hazardous-choice.name: Hazardous Choice
hazardous-choice.description: 33% chance to skip own turn, but deal 50% more damage.

healing-death.name: Healing Death
healing-death.description: On death, the rest of the Expedition recover all Health.

auto-curse.name: Auto Curse
auto-curse.description: Self apply Curse on battle start.

death-bomb.name: Death Bomb
death-bomb.description: On Death, deal damage to all enemies.

shielding-death.name: Shielding Death
shielding-death.description: On death, allies gain 3 Shield points.

inverted-affinity.name: Inverted Affinity
inverted-affinity.description: Apply Inverted on self for 3 turns on battle start. 50% increased damage while Inverted.

auto-burn.name: Auto Burn
auto-burn.description: Self apply Burn on battle start.

at-deaths-door.name: At Death's Door
at-deaths-door.description: Deal 50% more damage if Health is below 10%.

sos-shell.name: SOS Shell
sos-shell.description: Apply Shell when falling below 50% Health.

sos-power.name: SOS Power
sos-power.description: Apply Powerful when falling below 50% Health.

sos-rush.name: SOS Rush
sos-rush.description: Apply Rush when falling below 50% Health.

double-burn.name: Double Burn
double-burn.description: On applying a Burn stack, apply a second one.

healing-fire.name: Healing Fire
healing-fire.description: Recover 25% Health when attacking a Burning target. Once per turn.

rewarding-mark.name: Rewarding Mark
rewarding-mark.description: +2 AP on dealing damage to a Marked target. Once per turn.

double-mark.name: Double Mark
double-mark.description: Mark requires 1 more hit to be removed.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: First Free Aim shot each turn deals 200% increased damage and can Break.

cheater.name: Cheater
cheater.description: Always play twice in a row.

powerful-shield.name: Powerful Shield
powerful-shield.description: 10% increased damage per Shield Point on self.

base-shield.name: Base Shield
base-shield.description: +1 Shield if not affected by any Shield on turn start.

in-medias-res.name: In Medias Res
in-medias-res.description: +3 Shields on Battle Start, but max Health is halved.

shield-affinity.name: Shield Affinity
shield-affinity.description: 30% increased damage while having Shields, but receiving any damage always removes all Shields.

critical-moment.name: Critical Moment
critical-moment.description: 50% increased Critical Chance if Health is below 30%.

warming-up.name: Warming Up
warming-up.description: 5% increased damage per turn. Can stack up to 5 times.

glass-canon.name: Glass Canon
glass-canon.description: Deal 25% more damage, but take 25% more damage.

faster-than-strong.name: Faster Than Strong
faster-than-strong.description: Always play twice in a row, but deal 50% less damage.

shortcut.name: Shortcut
shortcut.description: Immediately play when falling below 30% Health. Once per battle.

defensive-mode.name: Defensive Mode
defensive-mode.description: On receiving damage, consume 1 MP to take 30% less damage, if possible.

shared-care.name: Shared Care
shared-care.description: When Healing an ally, also Heal self for 50% of that value.

powerful-heal.name: Powerful Heal
powerful-heal.description: Healing an ally also applies Powerful for 1 turn.

accelerating-heal.name: Accelerating Heal
accelerating-heal.description: Healing an ally also applies Rush for 1 turn.

energising-heal.name: Energising Heal
energising-heal.description: On Healing an ally, also give 2 AP.

protecting-heal.name: Protecting Heal
protecting-heal.description: Healing an ally also applies Shell for 1 turn.

confident-fighter.name: Confident Fighter
confident-fighter.description: 30% increased damage, but can't be Healed.

healing-share.name: Healing Share
healing-share.description: Receive 15% of all Heals affecting other characters.

weakness-gain.name: Weakness Gain
weakness-gain.description: +1 AP on hitting an enemy's Weakness. Once per turn.

energetic-healer.name: Energetic Healer
energetic-healer.description: +2 AP on Healing an ally. Once per turn.

beneficial-contamination.name: Beneficial Contamination
beneficial-contamination.description: +2 AP on applying a Status Effect. Once per turn.

roulette.name: Roulette
roulette.description: Every hit has a 50% chance to deal either 50% or 200% of its damage.

soul-eater.name: Soul Eater
soul-eater.description: Deal 30% more damage, but lose 20% Health per turn.

painter.name: Painter
painter.description: Convert all Physical damage to Void damage.

immaculate.name: Immaculate
immaculate.description: 30% increased damage until a hit is received.

tainted.name: Tainted
tainted.description: 15% increased damage for each Status Effect on self.

first-offensive.name: First Offensive
first-offensive.description: First hit dealt and taken deals 50% more damage.

burning-mark.name: Burning Mark
burning-mark.description: Apply Burn on hitting a Marked enemy.

powerful-mark.name: Powerful Mark
powerful-mark.description: Gain Powerful on hitting a Marked enemy.

healing-mark.name: Healing Mark
healing-mark.description: Recover 25% Health on hitting a Marked enemy. Once per turn.

stay-marked.name: Stay Marked
stay-marked.description: 50% chance to apply Mark when attacking a Marked target.

burning-shots.name: Burning Shots
burning-shots.description: 20% chance to Burn on Free Aim shot.

free-aim-inverted-shot.name: Free Aim Inverted Shot
free-aim-inverted-shot.description: Free Aim shots can apply Inverted.

marking-shots.name: Marking Shots
marking-shots.description: 20% chance to apply Mark on Free Aim shot.

powerful-shots.name: Powerful Shots
powerful-shots.description: 20% chance to gain Powerful on Free Aim shot.

protecting-shots.name: Protecting Shots
protecting-shots.description: 20% chance to gain Shell on Free Aim shot.

accelerating-shots.name: Accelerating Shots
accelerating-shots.description: 20% chance to gain Rush on Free Aim shot.

energising-shots.name: Energising Shots
energising-shots.description: 20% chance to gain 1 AP on Free Aim shot.

versatile.name: Versatile
versatile.description: After a Free Aim hit, Base Attack damage is increased by 50% for 1 turn.

empowering-attack.name: Empowering Attack
empowering-attack.description: Gain Powerful for 1 turn on Base Attack.

protecting-attack.name: Protecting Attack
protecting-attack.description: Gain Shell for 1 turn on Base Attack.

enfeebling-attack.name: Enfeebling Attack
enfeebling-attack.description: Base Attack applies Powerless for 1 turn.

exposing-attack.name: Exposing Attack
exposing-attack.description: Base Attack applies Defenseless for 1 turn.

empowering-parry.name: Empowering Parry
empowering-parry.description: Each successful Parry increases damage by 5% until end of the following turn. Taking any damage removes this buff.

energising-pain.name: Energising Pain
energising-pain.description: No longer gain AP on Parry. +1 AP on getting hit.

powered-attack.name: Powered Attack
powered-attack.description: On every damage dealt, try to consume 1 AP. If successful, increase damage by 20%.

staggering-attack.name: Staggering Attack
staggering-attack.description: 50% increased Break damage on Base Attack.

quick-break.name: Quick Break
quick-break.description: Play again on Breaking a target.

empowering-break.name: Empowering Break
empowering-break.description: Gain Powerful on Breaking a target.

breaking-shots.name: Breaking Shots
breaking-shots.description: 50% increased Break damage with Free Aim shots.

fueling-break.name: Fueling Break
fueling-break.description: Breaking a target doubles its Burn amount.

gradient-recovery.name: Gradient Recovery
gradient-recovery.description: Recover 10% Health on using a Gradient Charge.

charging-attack.name: Charging Attack
charging-attack.description: +15% of a Gradient Charge on Base Attack.

gradient-breaker.name: Gradient Breaker
gradient-breaker.description: 50% increased Break damage with Gradient Attacks.

post-gradient.name: Post Gradient
post-gradient.description: Play immediately after using a Gradient Attack.

charging-recovery.name: Charging Recovery
charging-recovery.description: 50% increased Gradient Generation with Healing Skills.

charging-counter.name: Charging Counter
charging-counter.description: +10% of a Gradient Charge on Counterattack.

charging-weakness.name: Charging Weakness
charging-weakness.description: +15% of a Gradient Charge on hitting a Weakness. Once per turn.

charging-mark.name: Charging Mark
charging-mark.description: +20% of a Gradient Charge on hitting a Marked target. Once per turn.

better-healing-tint.name: Better Healing Tint
better-healing-tint.description: Healing Tints have double the Healing effect.

cleansing-tint.name: Cleansing Tint
cleansing-tint.description: Healing Tints also remove all Status Effects from the target.

great-healing-tint.name: Great Healing Tint
great-healing-tint.description: Healing Tints now affect the whole Expedition.

great-energy-tint.name: Great Energy Tint
great-energy-tint.description: Energy Tints now affect the whole Expedition.

charging-tint.name: Charging Tint
charging-tint.description: +5% of a Gradient Charge on using an item.

energising-burn.name: Energising Burn
energising-burn.description: +1 AP on applying Burn. Once per turn.

breaking-burn.name: Breaking Burn
breaking-burn.description: 25% increased Break damage on Burning enemies.

critical-burn.name: Critical Burn
critical-burn.description: Can land critical hits by rolling a 5 on the die if target is Burning.

burning-death.name: Burning Death
burning-death.description: Apply 3 Burn to all enemies on Death.

critical-break.name: Critical Break
critical-break.description: 25% increased Break damage on Critical hits.

critical-stun.name: Critical Stun
critical-stun.description: Increased critical hit chance against stunned enemies.

critical-vulnerability.name: Critical Vulnerability
critical-vulnerability.description: 25% increased Critical Chance on Defenceless enemies.

empowering-dodge.name: Empowering Dodge
empowering-dodge.description: 5% increased damage for each consecutive successful Dodge. Can stack up to 10 times.

longer-rush.name: Longer Rush
longer-rush.description: On applying Rush, its duration is increased by 2.

evasive-healer.name: Evasive Healer
evasive-healer.description: Heals provided are doubled until any damage is taken.

healing-boon.name: Healing Boon
healing-boon.description: Heal 15% HP on applying a buff.

energising-cleanse.name: Energising Cleanse
energising-cleanse.description: Dispel the first negative Status Effect received and gain 2 MP.

draining-cleanse.name: Draining Cleanse
draining-cleanse.description: Consume 1 AP to prevent Status Effects application, if possible.

charging-critical.name: Charging Critical
charging-critical.description: +20% of a Gradient Charge on Critical Hit. Once per turn.

charging-burn.name: Charging Burn
charging-burn.description: +20% of a Gradient Charge on applying Burn. Once per turn.

charging-stun.name: Charging Stun
charging-stun.description: +5% of a Gradient Charge on hitting a Stunned enemy.

charging-alteration.name: Charging Alteration
charging-alteration.description: +10% of a Gradient Charge on applying a Buff. Once per turn.

the-best-defense.name: The Best Defense
the-best-defense.description: Deal 50% more damage, but can't Parry or Dodge.

passive-defense.name: Passive Defense
passive-defense.description: Reduce damage taken by 50%, but can't Parry or Dodge.

successive-parry.name: Successive Parry
successive-parry.description: Can't Dodge. +5% increased damage per Parry until damage taken.

cleas-life.name: Clea's Life
cleas-life.description: On turn start, if no damage taken since last turn, recover 100% Health.

passives.4: 50% increased damage on Rank D. No damage increase on other ranks.
passives.10: 50% increased Base Attack damage.
passives.20: On Rank D, recover 20% Health with Base Attack.

passives.4: Kill self on battle start.
passives.10: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.
passives.20: Play first.

passives.4: Perfection is now based on current Health. Gain 1 Rank every 20% missing Health.
passives.10: 20% increased Light damage with Skills.
passives.20: +1 AP on Rank Up.

passives.4: Start battle at Rank S, but can't be Healed or gain Shields.
passives.10: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.
passives.20: Apply Rush on Rank S.

passives.4: Light damage can Burn on Critical hits.
passives.10: Apply 3 Burn instead of Mark.
passives.20: Increase Burn damage by 50% per Rank, up to 300% on Rank S.

passives.4: Switch to Rank S on Break. Base Attack can Break.
passives.10: 100% Critical Chance on Rank S.
passives.20: Triggers a lightning strike on Critical hits.

passives.4: Base Attack applies 2 Burn stack per Rank.
passives.10: +1 AP on Rank Up.
passives.20: Increase Burn damage by 50% per Rank, up to 300% on Rank S.

passives.4: Don't lose Rank when taking damage from Powerless enemies.
passives.10: +1 Perfection on hitting a Powerless enemy.
passives.20: Apply Powerless on Counterattack.

passives.4: No Perfection loss on damage taken. Perfection is instead lost on being Healed.
passives.10: Gain 2 AP on Counterattack.
passives.20: Gain 1 Rank on Counterattack.

passives.4: Base attack gives 1 Perfection per Burn on target.
passives.10: While Powerful, 20% chance to Burn on hit.
passives.20: +1 AP on Rank Up.

passives.4: Start battle on Rank B, but 50% Health.
passives.10: Recover 15% Health on Base Attack.
passives.20: Apply Powerful on Rank B.

passives.4: Casting a Light Skill increases damage of next Physical Skill cast by 50% and vice versa.
passives.10: 20% increased Physical damage with Skills.
passives.20: Dealing Light damage with a Skill recovers 3% Health.

passives.4: Gain 1 Rank on Counterattack.
passives.10: 50% increased Counterattack damage.
passives.20: Gain 2 AP on Counterattack.

passives.4: Play again after a Base Attack.
passives.10: 50% increased Base Attack damage.
passives.20: Base Attack gives 4 Perfection.

passives.4: When hit, lose 1 Perfection instead of 1 Rank.
passives.10: Apply Rush on Rank S.
passives.20: Gain 2 Perfection on turn start.

passives.4: Convert Light damage from Skills to Physical damage.
passives.10: 20% increased Physical damage with Skills.
passives.20: -1 AP cost for Physical Skills.

passives.4: +1 Perfection on Critical hit.
passives.10: Self-Heal by 2% Health on dealing a Critical hit.
passives.20: Counterattack is always a Critical hit.

passives.4: Rank can't be lower than C.
passives.10: Base Attack gives 4 Perfection.
passives.20: Parrying gives 2 Perfection instead of 1.

passives.4: Base Attack consumes all Shields to deal 100% increased damage per Shield.
passives.10: +1 Shield on Counterattack.
passives.20: Base Attack gives 4 Perfection.

passives.4: Double Perfection gained on Free Aim shots.
passives.10: Free Aim shots break 2 Shields.
passives.20: 50% increased Free Aim damage.

passives.4: Can't lose Perfection. No damage increase from Rank.
passives.10: 50% increased Base Attack damage.
passives.20: Base Attack gives 4 Perfection.

passives.4: +1 to all Perfection gain but can't reach Rank S.
passives.10: Base Attack gives 4 Perfection.
passives.20: 20% increased Light damage with Skills.

passives.4: An ethereal Sword deals Light damage on any damage dealt with Skills.
passives.10: 20% chance to apply Burn on dealing Light damage.
passives.20: Can't die if at least Rank A.

passives.4: Bonus damage from Perfection applies to all allies at half value. Bonus damage no longer applies to Verso.
passives.10: Perfection gained is increased by 1 while Powerful.
passives.20: Support Skills cost 1 less AP.

passives.4: Gain 1 Rank on applying Mark.
passives.10: Mark an enemy on Base Attack.
passives.20: Apply Powerless on Marking an enemy.

passives.4: Base Attack applies 2 Burn per Fire Stain.
passives.10: Generate one Fire Stain at the beginning of each turn.
passives.20: 30% increased Burn damage per Fire Stain.

passives.4: Kill self on battle start.
passives.10: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.
passives.20: Play first.

passives.4: Healing Skills cost 1 less AP.
passives.10: Generate one Earth Stain at the beginning of each turn.
passives.20: Replay instantly on consuming Stains with a Healing Skill.

passives.4: Using a Skill that consumes Stains increases damage by 20%. Can stack up to 5 times. Resets on using a Skill without consuming Stains.
passives.10: On turn start, if no Stains, 2 random Stains are generated.
passives.20: +1 AP when Stains are consumed.

passives.4: 30% increased Critical Chance per Ice Stain.
passives.10: +5% of a Gradient Charge on Critical hit.
passives.20: 20% increased Fire damage with Skills.

passives.4: 30% increased Break damage per Earth Stain.
passives.10: Gain 9 AP on Breaking an enemy.
passives.20: Generate one Earth Stain at the beginning of each turn.

passives.4: 100% Critical Chance when 4 Stains are simultaneously active.
passives.10: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.
passives.20: Critical hits apply Burn.

passives.4: 50% chance to generate a Light Stain when consuming Stains.
passives.10: +1 AP on consuming a Light Stain.
passives.20: 20% increased damage with Skills per active Light Stain.

passives.4: Ice Skills cost 1 less AP.
passives.10: 20% increased Ice damage with Skills.
passives.20: Start battle with 1 Earth Stain.

passives.4: Lightning Skills cost 1 less AP.
passives.10: 20% increased Lightning damage with Skills.
passives.20: Start battle with 1 Fire Stain.

passives.4: Consuming an Earth Stain applies 1 Shield to self.
passives.10: 20% increased Earth damage with Skills.
passives.20: Base Attack generates an Earth Stain.

passives.4: Casting a Skill increases the Skill damage of all other elements by 20%. Resets when casting a Skill of a previous element.
passives.10: On turn start, if no Stains, 2 random Stains are generated.
passives.20: +1 AP when Stains are consumed.

passives.4: Fire Skills cost 1 less AP.
passives.10: 20% increased Fire damage with Skills.
passives.20: Start battle with 1 Ice Stain.

passives.4: 50% chance to generate a Dark or Light Stain when consuming Stains. Deal 50% more damage with Skills per active Dark Stain.
passives.10: +1 AP on consuming a Light Stain.
passives.20: Base Attacks can consume one Dark Stain to deal 200% more damage.

passives.4: Earth Skills cost 1 less AP.
passives.10: 20% increased Earth damage with Skills.
passives.20: Start battle with 1 Lightning Stain.

passives.4: Healing Skills generate one additional Light Stain.
passives.10: Consuming a Light Stain applies Slow to a random enemy.
passives.20: Base Attack generates a Light Stain.

passives.4: Healing Skills generate one additional Light Stain.
passives.10: Generate one Ice Stain at the beginning of each turn.
passives.20: Replay instantly on consuming Stains with a Healing Skill.

passives.4: Using a Gradient Attack generates 1 additional Light Stain.
passives.10: When a Fire Stain is generated, a Lightning Stain is also generated. Once per turn.
passives.20: Gradient Attacks and Gradient Counters deal 50% more damage.

passives.4: 50% chance to generate a Dark Stain when consuming Stains. Deal 50% more damage with Skills per active Dark Stain.
passives.10: Base Attacks can consume one Dark Stain to deal 200% more damage.
passives.20: With 4 active Dark Stains, any Skill can consume them to deal 300% more damage.

passives.4: Freeze self when falling below 30% health. Prevent the next instance of damage while Frozen.
passives.10: On turn start, if Frozen, remove Freeze and recover 60% Health.
passives.20: Gain 2 Ice Stains and 3 AP when Frozen.

passives.4: Generate a random Stain on Free Aim shot.
passives.10: +1 AP when Stains are consumed.
passives.20: Base Attack generates 2 random Stains.

passives.4: Free Aim Shots deal damage to an additional random target.
passives.10: 50% increased Free Aim damage.
passives.20: Generate a random Stain on Free Aim shot.

passives.4: Kill self on battle start.
passives.10: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.
passives.20: Play first.

passives.4: Steal Shields removed by hitting enemies.
passives.10: Switch to Virtuose Stance on breaking any Shield.
passives.20: Hitting a Marked enemy breaks all its Shields.

passives.4: Double Gradient generation while in Defensive Stance.
passives.10: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Defensive Stance.
passives.20: +5% of a Gradient Charge on Parry.

passives.4: Critical hits apply Burn.
passives.10: Base Attack applies 2 Burn.
passives.20: 100% Critical Chance while Stanceless.

passives.4: On Defensive Stance, gain 1 Shield per Parry. Lose all Shields on turn start.
passives.10: 20% increased Light damage with Skills.
passives.20: 50% increased Counter damage per Shield.

passives.4: On turn start, if Stanceless, switch to Offensive Stance.
passives.10: Fire Skills cost 1 less AP.
passives.20: +1 Shield on switching to Offensive Stance.

passives.4: Critical hits with Skills give 2 AP. Once per turn.
passives.10: 20% increased Lightning damage with Skills.
passives.20: +50% Critical Chance while in Offensive Stance.

passives.4: Self-Heal by 2% Health on dealing a Critical hit.
passives.10: +50% Critical Chance while in Defensive Stance.
passives.20: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Defensive Stance.

passives.4: In Defensive Stance, gaining AP also gives 1 AP to allies.
passives.10: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Defensive Stance.
passives.20: +1 AP on Stance switch.

passives.4: In Offensive Stance, double the amount of Burn applied.
passives.10: 50% increased Burn damage.
passives.20: Base Attack propagates Burn.

passives.4: Allies recover 20% Health on switching to Virtuose Stance.
passives.10: Gain Shell when switching out of Virtuose Stance.
passives.20: Cleanse self Status Effects when switching to Virtuose Stance.

passives.4: Switch to Virtuose Stance on Counterattack.
passives.10: Apply 5 Burn on Counterattack.
passives.20: 50% increased Counter damage per Shield.

passives.4: In Virtuose Stance, hitting a Marked enemy doesn't remove Mark.
passives.10: Switch to Virtuose Stance on Counterattack.
passives.20: Gain Shell when switching out of Virtuose Stance.

passives.4: Start in Virtuose Stance.
passives.10: In Virtuose Stance, every Burn applied is doubled.
passives.20: In Virtuose Stance, Burn deals double damage.

passives.4: Allies recover 20% Health on switching to Virtuose Stance.
passives.10: Applies Shell when Health is above 80%.
passives.20: Switch to Virtuose Stance when Health falls below 50%.

passives.4: On turn start, if Stanceless, switch to Defensive Stance.
passives.10: In Defensive Stance, double Break damage.
passives.20: Support Skills cost 1 less AP.

passives.4: +1 Shield on switching to Offensive Stance.
passives.10: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Offensive Stance.
passives.20: +50% Critical Chance while in Offensive Stance.

passives.4: Switch to Virtuose Stance on breaking any Shield.
passives.10: Free Aim shots break 2 Shields.
passives.20: In Virtuose Stance, all damage pierce Shields.

passives.4: Apply Burn on self on turn start. 10% increased damage for each self Burn stack.
passives.10: Base Attack applies 2 Burn.
passives.20: While in Defensive Stance, receive Heal instead of Burn damage.

passives.4: In Defensive Stance, double Break damage.
passives.10: Gain 9 AP on Breaking an enemy.
passives.20: Breaking an enemy deals a high amount of Earth damage.

passives.4: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Offensive Stance.
passives.10: Counterattacks apply Defenceless.
passives.20: +50% Critical Chance while in Offensive Stance.

passives.4: +1 AP on Stance switch.
passives.10: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Defensive Stance.
passives.20: Recover 5% Health on Stance switch.

passives.4: Applying Shell also applies 1 Shield.
passives.10: On applying Shields, also give 1 AP.
passives.20: On switching to Virtuose Stance, double all Shields on allies.

passives.4: Kill self on battle start.
passives.10: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.
passives.20: Play first.

passives.4: Reverse Bestial Wheel order.
passives.10: Using an Upgraded Skill gives 1 AP to all other allies.
passives.20: Almighty Mask gives 2 AP to all allies.

passives.4: Start battle in Agile Mask.
passives.10: Agile Mask applies Rush for 3 turns.
passives.20: +50% Critical Chance while in Agile Mask.

passives.4: Replay instantly when in Almighty Mask.
passives.10: +3 AP when in Almighty Mask.
passives.20: Revive instantly with full Health if dead while in Almighty Mask. Once per Battle.

passives.4: Start battle in Caster Mask.
passives.10: Caster Mask applies Regen for 3 turns.
passives.20: Skills cost 1 less AP while in Caster Mask.

passives.4: Free Aim shots spin the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
passives.10: Free Aim shots deal 100% more damage with all Masks except Almighty.
passives.20: 100% Critical Chance while in Almighty Mask.

passives.4: Start battle in Heavy Mask.
passives.10: Heavy Mask applies Shell for 3 turns.
passives.20: +1 AP per hit taken.

passives.4: Start battle in Almighty Mask.
passives.10: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.
passives.20: Break damage is doubled while in Almighty Mask.

passives.4: Start battle in Balanced Mask.
passives.10: Balanced Mask applies Powerful for 3 turns.
passives.20: Critical hits deal 30% more damage while in Balanced Mask.

passives.4: Parries increase the Bestial Wheel by 1. Taking damage resets the Bestial Wheel.
passives.10: Upgraded Skills deal 30% more damage.
passives.20: +1 AP on Mask change.

passives.4: 30% increased damage per Upgraded Skill used. Resets on using a non-Upgraded Skill.
passives.10: Base Attack spins the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
passives.20: Using an Upgraded Skill gives 1 AP to all other allies.

passives.4: Switch to Almighty Mask on Breaking an enemy.
passives.10: Almighty Mask gives 2 AP to all allies.
passives.20: 50% increased Break damage.

passives.4: Free Aim shots can consume 1 Foretell to deal 100% more damage.
passives.10: Base Attack applies 3 Foretell.
passives.20: During Twilight, Free Aim shots deal double damage.

passives.4: Kill self on battle start.
passives.10: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.
passives.20: Play first.

passives.4: While having at least 1 active Moon charge, Moon Skills are always Critical but damage taken is doubled.
passives.10: 25% increased damage per Moon charge.
passives.20: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.

passives.4: Consuming Foretell applies 2 Burn on target per Sun Charge.
passives.10: 100% increased Burn damage in Twilight state.
passives.20: Sun Skills give one more charge.

passives.4: 100% Critical Chance during Twilight.
passives.10: Apply 1 Foretell on Critical hit.
passives.20: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.

passives.4: Sun Skills always apply 10 Foretell, but all damage taken is doubled.
passives.10: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge and consumes all Foretell to apply Burn.
passives.20: 100% increased Burn damage in Twilight state.

passives.4: Curse self on battle start. Deal 50% more damage while Cursed.
passives.10: Reset Curse duration when entering Twilight state.
passives.20: Play again when entering Twilight state.

passives.4: +1 AP per Moon charge on turn start.
passives.10: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.
passives.20: During Twilight, Base Attack consumes all AP. Base Attack applies 1 Foretell and deals 50% increased damage per AP consumed.

passives.4: While having at least 1 active Sun charge, apply one Burn stack per hit taken.
passives.10: Counterattacks apply 1 Burn per active Sun charge.
passives.20: Base attack can consume 1 Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell.

passives.4: During Twilight, every time Foretell is applied it also affects another random enemy.
passives.10: Apply 1 Burn every 3 Foretell applied with Skills.
passives.20: 20% increased Fire damage with Skills.

passives.4: On Twilight Start, apply Mark to all enemies.
passives.10: Hitting a Marked enemy during Twilight doesn't remove Mark.
passives.20: Apply 3 Foretell on applying Mark.

passives.4: Free Aim shots can consume a Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell and consume a Moon charge to deal 400% more damage.
passives.10: Consuming a Sun or Moon charge gives 1 AP.
passives.20: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.

passives.4: During Moon, all allies have Greater Rush. During Sun, all enemies have Greater Slow.
passives.10: During Twilight, all allies have Greater Rush and all enemies have Greater Slow.
passives.20: +3 AP on applying a Buff or Debuff. Once per turn.

passives.4: Killing an enemy with Foretell applies its Foretell to another random enemy.
passives.10: Apply Mark on consuming Foretell.
passives.20: 20% increased Dark damage with Skills.

passives.4: On Twilight Start, deal damage to all enemies based on the amount of charges.
passives.10: On Twilight Start, apply 2 Foretell per charge to all enemies.
passives.20: Double Sun and Moon charge generation.

passives.4: Sun Skills have increased damage for each Foretell on the target. Moon Skills don't generate Moon charges anymore.
passives.10: With at least 1 active Sun charge, gain one additional AP per Foretell consumed.
passives.20: Base attack can consume 1 Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell.

passives.4: During Twilight, all damage dealt is converted to Dark damage.
passives.10: 20% increased Dark damage with Skills.
passives.20: Apply Shell during Moon, Powerful during Sun, and Rush during Twilight.

passives.4: Can consume 1 Moon charge on turn start to recover 20% of each ally's Health.
passives.10: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.
passives.20: Moon Skills give one more charge.

passives.4: Recover 5% Health per Foretell applied.
passives.10: Healing Skills cost 1 less AP.
passives.20: 30% increased Heal efficiency per Moon charge. Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.

passives.4: On turn start, gain 1 Shield if at least 1 Sun charge is active.
passives.10: Apply 5 Foretell on enemies that break Shields.
passives.20: +2 Sun charges on Counterattack.

passives.4: Extend Twilight by one turn on using a Moon Skill. +50% Twilight damage increase on using a Sun Skill.
passives.10: Twilight duration is increased by 1.
passives.20: Play again when entering Twilight state.
